name: bxf
description: bxf is a versatile request library specifically designed for browsers, encapsulating both XHR and Fetch functionalities. In addition to handling regular network requests, it seamlessly supports network requests in the background with manifest_version 3.
author: slongzhang <slongZhang@126.com> (https://gitee.com/slongzhag || https://github.com/slongzhang)
